comment.author: 52581810@N02
comment._content: Two coupled diesellocos of a type which was originally designed for/ordered by the German Wehrmacht, second half of the thirties. After the war these locos were as type V36 used by the German Federal Railways DB till he beginning of the seventies.

comment.author: 8293801@N07
comment._content: Some of the V36 had a mechanical connection between the controllers, allowing to operate both from one cab and pull heavy trains. They were coupled cab to cab as shown.
